resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104422</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104422</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202625</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Folklife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Folklife</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn North Carolina folklore, traditions, war activities, local legends, superstitions, food preparation traditions, art, songs and dances which are unique to the area.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen Nord-Carolina Folklore, 
Traditionen, Kriegaktivitäten, lokale Legenden, Superstitions, 
Lebensmittelzubereitung Traditionen, kunst, Liede und Tänze, die zum 
Bereich eindeutig sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront le folklore du nord
de la Caroline, les traditions, les activités de guerre, les 
légendes locales, les superstitions, les traditions de préparation 
de nourriture, l'art, les chansons et les danses qui sont seuls à la 
zone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão o folklore de 
North.carolina, as tradições, as atividades da guerra, as legendas 
locais, os superstitions, as tradições da preparação de alimento, 
a arte, as canções e as danças que são originais à área.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno il folclore del 
North.carolina, le tradizioni, le attività di guerra, le leggende 
locali, i superstitions, le tradizioni della preparazione di alimento,
l'arte, le canzoni ed i balli che sono unici alla zona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τη λαογραφία της βόρειας 
Καρολίνας, τις παραδόσεις, τις πολεμικές δραστηριότητες, τους 
τοπικούς μύθους, τις δεισιδαιμονίες, τις παραδόσεις προετοιμασιών
τροφίμων, την τέχνη, τα τραγούδια και τους χορούς που είναι 
μοναδικοί στην περιοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán el folklore de 
Carolina del Norte, las tradiciones, las actividades de la guerra, las
leyendas locales, las supersticiones, las tradiciones de la 
preparación de alimento, el arte, las canciones y las danzas que son 
únicos al área.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104422</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/folklife</uri>
